targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: Wait a minute...you have a brother named Martin McFly?

contextAfter.text: Martin used to let men provoke him into fightin'. He was concerned people would tink him a coward if he refused. That's how he got a bowie knife shoved through his belly in a saloon in Virginia City. Never considered the future, poor Martin, God rest his soul.
Sure hopin' you're considerin' the future, Mr. Eastwood.
I think about it all the time.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
